original: @335a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @335a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya badzra aa dzi ta aa na la pra mo ha ni n'a ma dha ra n'i /
analyzed: a'arya badzra aa dzi ta aa na la pra mo ha ni n'a ma dha ra n'i /
translated: Ārya-vajra-ajita-anala-pramohana-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: bod skad du; 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: bod skad du; 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs /
translated: In Tibetan: Ārya-vajra-ajita-anala-pramohana-nāma-dhāraṇī

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri'i gangs /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in the Jewel-stacked Cave,

original: ri sul gyi mchog /🔽ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing ri'ur bres pa 'bar ba /
analyzed: ri sul gyi mchog / ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing ri'ur bres pa 'bar ba /
translated: on the summit of a mountain,🔽a place filled with various golden rocks,

original: rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa /
translated: like the lower and middle parts of Mount Meru, ablaze with the various rainbow-like lights of many precious rocks,🔽a spacious rocky surface,

original: me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa /
analyzed: me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa /
translated: strewn with fragrant flowers, and the interior of the cave and forest perfumed with many fragrant powders and incense.

original: bdug pa dang / aa ga ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
analyzed: bdug pa dang / aa ga ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te de na bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
translated: He was seated on a beautiful mountain, adorned with incense, aloeswood, powders, bells, and canopies. There the Blessed One was surrounded by a vast assembly of gods, sons of gods, asuras,

original: lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /
translated: sons of asuras, gods, garuḍas, nāgas, yakṣas, kinnaras, rākṣasas, gandharvas, accomplished vidyādhara-s,

original: @335b 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te /
analyzed: @335b 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te /
translated: bhūtas, vināyakas, piśācas, and the hosts of the visible and invisible mātṛkā-s. The assembly extended for five hundred yojanas.

original: de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go /
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go /
translated: He was together with seventy-five thousand bodhisattvas and twelve thousand five hundred monks.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni; chos ston te /🔽gnas par bde ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni; chos ston te / gnas par bde ba /
translated: The Blessed One was teaching the Dharma.🔽He was teaching the Dharma that is pleasant to practice,

original: mnyan na bde ba /
analyzed: mnyan na bde ba /
translated: pleasant to hear,

original: 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to //
analyzed: 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to //
translated: and that leads to the transcendence of saṃsāra.

original: de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
analyzed: de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang /
translated: There were gods, sons of gods, asuras, sons of asuras, wind gods, sons of wind gods, garuḍas, nāgas, yakṣas,

original: mi'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang /
analyzed: mi'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang /
translated: kinnaras, rākṣasas, sons of rākṣasas, gandharvas, accomplished vidyādharas, bhūtas, ḍākas, piśācas, and the hosts of mātṛkās, both visible and invisible.

original: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to //
analyzed: 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to //
translated: making terrifying and pitiful sounds.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect Buddha Śākyamuni heard those sounds and said,

original: kye bzhin bzang @336a *//
analyzed: kye bzhin bzang @336a *//
translated: “Hey, good people!

original: dag / ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin /
analyzed: dag / ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin /
translated: Why are you crying out, making terrifying and pitiful sounds of distress?”

original: de dag gis gsol pa /
analyzed: de dag gis gsol pa /
translated: They replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag cag ni /🔽dag du bgyis te /
analyzed: bdag cag ni / dag du bgyis te /
translated: we are🔽being harmed and dragged around.

original: gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te mtho brtsams na /
analyzed: gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te mtho brtsams na /
translated: We are being dragged and pulled, and our pride is being crushed.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bskyab tu gsol /
analyzed: bskyab tu gsol /
translated: please protect us!”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa /
translated: When they said this, the Blessed One, with his mind endowed with the supreme wisdom, intelligence, activity, and activity-completion that reveals the vast maṇḍala above all,

original: sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab tu nye ste chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te /🔽rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa /
analyzed: sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab tu nye ste chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te / rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who has attained a level other than the great level, who is close to being a regent, who has been consecrated to the kingdom of the Dharma, comes merely by the consideration of the bodhisattva.🔽His shoulders are broad like the peak of Mount Meru.

original: rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa /
translated: His head is like a vajra, his crown protrudes, he is radiant, and he has a vajra armlet.

original: lus mkhregs shing sra ba /
analyzed: lus mkhregs shing sra ba /
translated: His body is firm and solid.

original: lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag cha brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag cha brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa /
translated: He holds a vajra, a noose, and a blazing firm weapon in his hand.

original: rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
analyzed: rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa /
translated: He is a vajra stake that completely destroys with firmness.

original: mthu chen po g-yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mthu chen po g-yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa /
translated: He has great power and 450,000 servants.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / @336b rin po che'i rdo rje dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / @336b rin po che'i rdo rje dang /
translated: They illuminated the entire world realm and summoned the vajra family youths, the vajra clubs, the vajra essence, the vajra crest, the vajra light, the blue vajra, the precious vajra,

original: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rigs pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang /
analyzed: gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rigs pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang /
translated: the secret vajra, the wheel vajra, and so forth, as well as the great vajra generals, the protectors, the rulers, the kings of the vajra class who are correct and incorrect and who understand what is correct,

original: rdo rje'i yum rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par bskul /
analyzed: rdo rje'i yum rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par bskul /
translated: the vajra mothers, and the vajra guides. They summoned the vajra youths, the vajra suppressors, and the vajra makers of bad dreams.

original: rnam par bskul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa kun snang bar byed /🔽rnam par snang bar byed /
analyzed: rnam par bskul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa kun snang bar byed / rnam par snang bar byed /
translated: They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.

original: gsal bar byed /🔽rnam par gsal bar byed /
analyzed: gsal bar byed / rnam par gsal bar byed /
translated: They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.

original: rab tu dga' bar byed /
analyzed: rab tu dga' bar byed /
translated: They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.

original: yang dag par bskul /🔽so sor bskul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dag par bskul / so sor bskul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de /

original: rdo rje 'chang /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang /
translated: They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.

original: khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang /
analyzed: khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang /
translated: They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.🔽They illuminated it.

original: 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag @337a *//🔽pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig /
analyzed: 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag @337a *// pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig /
translated: and the great assemblies, and fulfill their wishes.

original: de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: Then Vajradhara arose from his seat and, having entered into the midst of the hosts of gods, demigods, wind gods, garuḍas, and bhūtas, he taught and entered into the concentration called the vajra weapon torch.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to //
translated: Through his magical power, the worlds of the great trichiliocosm were tormented by the light of the blazing flames, the sparks that flew, and the lightning that fell.

original: de nas bskal pa chen po sngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang /🔽brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu byin no //
analyzed: de nas bskal pa chen po sngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu byin no //
translated: Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the desire realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of wisdom, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the form realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of concentration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the formless realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of aspiration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the desire realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of power, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the form realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of aspiration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the formless realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of gnosis, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the desire realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of skillful means, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the form realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of aspiration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.🔽Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the formless realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of aspiration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: de ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab gyi chos ston par gyur pa /
analyzed: de ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab gyi chos ston par gyur pa /
translated: Then, after great eons as numerous as the atoms in the desire realm, the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi attained the vajra of the perfection of aspiration, which was given to him by the buddhas of the ten directions.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed ba /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje byed ba /
translated: Then, after great eons as

original: rang gi rdo rje dang / @337b rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa /
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje dang / @337b rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa /
translated: one’s maṇḍala,🔽and one’s recitation.

original: drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba ste /
translated: Rudra, Īśvara, Yama, Varuṇa, Kubera, Vāyu, and Garuḍa are difficult to tame.

original: de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa /
analyzed: de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa /
translated: Thus, the wrathful bhagavān who arises from that is the one who confuses the deluded,

original: sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa /
analyzed: sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa /
translated: the one who stupefies those who are deceitful,

original: sdang ba rnams skyong pa /
analyzed: sdang ba rnams skyong pa /
translated: the one who protects those who are hateful,

original: rmongs pa rnams 'jigs pa /🔽dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa /🔽rgyas pa rnams spur mar rlog pa /
analyzed: rmongs pa rnams 'jigs pa / dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa / rgyas pa rnams spur mar rlog pa /
translated: the one who terrifies those who are ignorant,🔽the one who uproots those who are stubborn,🔽the one who overturns those who are arrogant,

original: yon po rnams srong ba /
analyzed: yon po rnams srong ba /
translated: the one who straightens those who are crooked,

original: gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed ba /
analyzed: gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed ba /
translated: the one who is compassionate to those who are cut off,

original: 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa /
analyzed: 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa /
translated: the one who frightens the bhūtas,

original: srin po rnams sdangs par byed pa /
analyzed: srin po rnams sdangs par byed pa /
translated: the one who terrifies the rākṣasas,

original: rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: and the one who perfects one’s mantra.

original: gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'bebs pa; nus pa rnams ston par byed pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'bebs pa; nus pa rnams ston par byed pa /
translated: He can bring down the secret mantras of others, reveal their powers,

original: gsod par byed pa gsod pa /
analyzed: gsod par byed pa gsod pa /
translated: kill them, and destroy their harm.

original: gnod par byed ba phung bar byed pa de der song nas lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de /
analyzed: gnod par byed ba phung bar byed pa de der song nas lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de /
translated: Having gone there, he subjugates the gods and the sons of gods.

original: de ltar drag po drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir bskul zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug /
analyzed: de ltar drag po drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir bskul zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug /
translated: Thus, he summons in general the powerful Rudras, the powerful Viṣṇus, the powerful asuras, and the powerful gods, and makes them enter the maṇḍala.

original: skyod par byed /
analyzed: skyod par byed /
translated: He makes them tremble.

original: mthu ston par byed /🔽brjed par byed /
analyzed: mthu ston par byed / brjed par byed /
translated: He displays his power.🔽He causes them to forget.

original: rnam par skrag par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par skrag par byed do //
translated: He terrifies them.

original: stobs bcu'i dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i @338a *//
analyzed: stobs bcu'i dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i @338a *//
translated: The Vajra Holder, who has the intention of the ten powers, spoke the vajra mantra called Invincible, Burning, and Deluding Like Fire.

original: gzungs gsungs pa dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas 'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum
analyzed: gzungs gsungs pa dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas 'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum
translated: That light made him very happy, and the light that arose from the vajra eclipsed the light of the stars and moon in the three worlds,🔽making it the sole illumination.🔽The great ocean

original: gyi ston gyi skar ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil du brlags par byas nas snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni /
analyzed: gyi ston gyi skar ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil du brlags par byas nas snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni /
translated: was dried up.

original: skem / ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni /
analyzed: skem / ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni /
translated: The king of mountains, Sumeru,

original: g-yo bar byed /
analyzed: g-yo bar byed /
translated: was shaken.🔽The circle of lightning and the thunder of hail

original: glog gi 'khor lo dang / lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni; bsgrags /
analyzed: glog gi 'khor lo dang / lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni; bsgrags /
translated: were proclaimed.

original: sgra drag po ni /
analyzed: sgra drag po ni /
translated: The loud sound🔽was expelled.

original: phyung / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni /
analyzed: phyung / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni /
translated: The sound of stretching🔽was proclaimed.🔽Fear

original: bsgrags / skrag par ni /
analyzed: bsgrags / skrag par ni /
translated: was created.

original: byas so // de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa /
analyzed: byas so // de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa /
translated: There, the dhāraṇī called Vajra Invincible Like Fire, Causing Great Confusion, which was inside the great blazing light of the fire-flame,

original: skra tshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba /
analyzed: skra tshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba /
translated: Her hair was like gold and jewels,🔽and she was called the Vajra Daughter of Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yid ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yid ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas /
translated: She circumambulated him three times and then, with the speed of a swift mind,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo //
translated: she went for refuge to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mahā­ṛddhi.

original: de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa /
analyzed: de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa /
translated: When she arrived, Ārya Vajradhara said,

original: skal ba chen po dge ma /
analyzed: skal ba chen po dge ma /
translated: Great fortunate one,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma 'di dag la lag cha dang @338b mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma 'di dag la lag cha dang @338b mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin cig /
translated: give them the power to act in accordance with the weapons of these ones who possess the mind of the samādhi of the Tathāgata.

original: de nas gzungs kyis smras pa /
analyzed: de nas gzungs kyis smras pa /
translated: Then Dhāraṇī said,

original: 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o //
translated: I will do as you have instructed.

original: zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so //
translated: She spoke these words three times.

original: thor tshugs gsum ma /
analyzed: thor tshugs gsum ma /
translated: She had three topknots,

original: sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug tho dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang /
analyzed: sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po'i rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug tho dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang /
translated: The three worlds, the three times, the three peaks of wrath, Viṣṇu’s discus, Yama’s club, Varuṇa’s noose, and the obstacles of the evil forces.

original: lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang /
analyzed: lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang / grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang /
translated: The illusions of the demigods, the splendor and strength of the wind gods, the confusion of the siddhas, the cutting of the host of mātṛkās, the samaya of the nāgas, their poison and wrath,🔽the yakṣas, rākṣasas, kinnaras, piśācas, bhūtas, Brahmara, kumbhāṇḍas, rākṣasas, piśācas, bhūtas, Brahmara, kumbhāṇḍas,

original: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang /
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang /
translated: and vetālas, and all the adversaries.

original: de bzhin du thams cad kyang skyongs shig /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad kyang skyongs shig /
translated: In the same way, protect all of them.

original: mig gi 'dzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa /
analyzed: mig gi 'dzum pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa /
translated: With just a smile, in an instant, he made offerings to all and offered this essence to Vajrapani, saying:

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great Yaksha general, Vajrapani the wrathful one.

original: tadya th'a / ta th'a ga ta sa m'a dha dh'i ra ni /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ta th'a ga ta sa m'a dha dh'i ra ni /
translated: Tadyatha: Tathagata Samadhi Dhirani,

original: ma h'a a'a barta yi shy'a mi /
analyzed: ma h'a a'a barta yi shy'a mi /
translated: Maha Avartashayami,

original: aa hi badzre /
analyzed: aa hi badzre /
translated: Ahi Vajre,

original: ku ti le /
analyzed: ku ti le /
translated: Kutile,

original: ko ti p'a ba k'a ku la shi khi /
analyzed: ko ti p'a ba k'a ku la shi khi /
translated: Kotiprabha Kulashikhi,

original: ka pi la ke shi /
analyzed: ka pi la ke shi /
translated: Kapilakeshi,

original: ta ti tsi ti mi ti mi /
analyzed: ta ti tsi ti mi ti mi /
translated: Tatit Cittimitimi,

original: karka @339a *// ta mu ti ba ta ti badzre /
analyzed: karka @339a *// ta mu ti ba ta ti badzre /
translated: Kartakamuti Batati Vajre,

original: ma h'a bi dhu la lo le /
analyzed: ma h'a bi dhu la lo le /
translated: Maha Vidhula Lole,

original: pu gu pu lu /
analyzed: pu gu pu lu /
translated: Pugupulu,

original: su mu su mu /
analyzed: su mu su mu /
translated: Sumusum,

original: sa ra sa ra /
analyzed: sa ra sa ra /
translated: Sarasar,

original: phat phat/ su dyo te /
analyzed: phat phat/ su dyo te /
translated: Phat phat Sudyote,

original: pim ga le tsi te /
analyzed: pim ga le tsi te /
translated: Pingale Citte,

original: bi tsa ti /
analyzed: bi tsa ti /
translated: Vicati,

original: dzva la ti /
analyzed: dzva la ti /
translated: Jvalati,

original: dzva la ping+ga le sarba de ba ga na /
analyzed: dzva la ping+ga le sarba de ba ga na /
translated: Jvalapingale Sarva Devagana,

original: pra ha ra na m'a y'a /
analyzed: pra ha ra na m'a y'a /
translated: Praharanamaya,

original: siddha d'a yi ke /
analyzed: siddha d'a yi ke /
translated: Siddhadayakhe,

original: su ru ke /
analyzed: su ru ke /
translated: Suruke,

original: ku ru ka /🔽badzra gho ne /
analyzed: ku ru ka / badzra gho ne /
translated: Kuruk,🔽Vajraghone,

original: badzra dri dha /
analyzed: badzra dri dha /
translated: Vajradriddhe,

original: s'a ra pra ha ra ne /
analyzed: s'a ra pra ha ra ne /
translated: sarva praharaṇe

original: ratna tra ya /🔽da kri la buddhe te /
analyzed: ratna tra ya / da kri la buddhe te /
translated: ratnatraya🔽dakṣiṇabuddhete

original: badzra dha ra bi shva sa ni ka /
analyzed: badzra dha ra bi shva sa ni ka /
translated: vajradhara viśva sanike

original: aa pra ti ha ta pra marda ni sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aa pra ti ha ta pra marda ni sv'ah'a /
translated: apratihata pramaradani svāhā.

original: gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam /
analyzed: gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam /
translated: Whoever, recollecting this mantra, recites it,

original: sgom mam / 'dzin pa de thos na /
analyzed: sgom mam / 'dzin pa de thos na /
translated: meditates on it, or upholds it,

original: ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not go to the lower realms of unfortunate rebirths.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have made offerings to all the worldly and transcendent maṇḍalas.

original: dam tshig dang / phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam tshig dang / phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have entered into the commitments and mudrās.

original: bsam ba dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: bsam ba dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gugs par byed do //
translated: They will be summoned by thoughts and aspirations.

original: dug dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par byed do //
analyzed: dug dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par byed do //
translated: They will be terrified by the fears of poison, mantras, knots, beatings, and bondage.

original: de nas lha dang / lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang /
analyzed: de nas lha dang / lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang /
translated: Then, by the power of that, the gods and sons of gods experienced the play of that Bhagavān Vajradhara and the many kinds of speech of the Bhagavān.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che @339b mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che @339b mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de /
translated: The gods of the higher realms, Akaniṣṭha, and those dwelling in other world systems made offerings with vast clouds of flowers, incense, and rains of many jewels, and praised him with beautiful praises.

original: snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
analyzed: snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
translated: The Bhagavān, having spoken thus, the bhikṣus, bodhisattvas, and the entire assembly rejoiced and praised what the Bhagavān had said.

original: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: The entire retinue rejoiced and praised what the Bhagavān had taught.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Dhāraṇī of the Vajra Invincibility that Completely Confuses Like Fire is finished.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
translated: The Indian preceptors Jinamitra and Dānaśīla, and the translator-editor, the monk Yeshé Dé, translated this, revised it, and finalized it after correcting it with the new terminology.
